```{bash}
ls *_set282_snpid.log > chr1_10_set282.txt

plink --merge-list chr1_10_set282.txt --make-bed --out chrall_flt2_ad_set282_snpid

plink -bfile chrall_flt2_ad_set282_snpid --freq --missing --out chrall_flt2_ad_set282_snpid
```
